thread.title: Children’s Books: Two for the Road

author: Meghan Cox Gurdon
title: Children’s Books: Two for the Road
text:
‘Know thyself,’ says the ancient Greek maxim. It is excellent advice. But what if a young woman has, at her core, a mystery so profound that it is hidden even from her? Can a young boy know himself if he is ignorant both of his origins and of his true nature? Two very different novels take young readers in and out of curious company and along twisty paths to solve such puzzles of identity and destiny.
In the rich, strange, frightening, fully realized world of “The Hazel Wood” (Flatiron, 359 pages, $16.99), a young woman...
